location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.1258 of 1855 from Henry Anderson, Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter, relating to the shipwreck and plunder of the cargo vessel Fath-el-Khymeroff the Oman coast. The letter encloses an extract of paragraph 23 from a despatch from the Honourable Court of Directors (folio 218), dated 17 of January 1855. The despatch acknowledges the recent shipwreck and plunder of the Fath-el-Khymer, adding that the Court awaits the outcome of representations to the Imam of Muscat.
